UI_visible_response: Read 31 web pagesView Page DetailsLi Shangfu was dismissed due to serious violations of Party discipline and the law. The investigation found that he:Seriously violated political discipline by not fulfilling the political responsibility of comprehensive and strict governance of the Party and resisting organizational review.Seriously violated organizational discipline by seeking improper benefits in personnel arrangements for himself and others.Used his position to seek benefits for others and accepted a huge amount of money and valuables in return, suspected of the crime of taking bribes.Offered money to others to seek undue benefits, constituting the suspected crime of offering bribes.His actions severely contaminated the political environment of the military's equipment sector and the ethics of relevant industries, causing great damage to the Party's cause, the development of national defense and the armed forces, and the image of senior officials.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: Li Shangfu was dismissed due to serious violations of Party discipline and the law. The investigation found that he:- Seriously violated political discipline by not fulfilling the political responsibility of comprehensive and strict governance of the Party and resisting organizational review[^1^][^5^][^13^].- Seriously violated organizational discipline by seeking improper benefits in personnel arrangements for himself and others[^1^][^5^][^13^].- Used his position to seek benefits for others and accepted a huge amount of money and valuables in return, suspected of the crime of taking bribes[^1^][^5^][^13^].- Offered money to others to seek undue benefits, constituting the suspected crime of offering bribes[^1^][^5^][^13^].- His actions severely contaminated the political environment of the military's equipment sector and the ethics of relevant industries, causing great damage to the Party's cause, the development of national defense and the armed forces, and the image of senior officials[^1^][^5^][^13^].
